item.dc:creator: Agent6
item.description:
BM is okish optimized (at least most of the SP chapters are, excluding STU), but there still are lots of things to do.

However, it’s interesting that this glitch is still happening. It was present at the EA release in 2015 and a patch was supposed to fix the issue (I know for sure because I’ve seen it mentioned in the notes somewhere), yet there have still been reports.

But you’re going way too far. It has nothing to do with the power of the PC… it’s just not working properly. It’s only a zoom & animation thing after all. The 2012 version used a slightly different iron sight system and if it worked just fine on my 9yrs old single core toaster… yeah.
